definition: a rank growth of grass/uncultivated land/wilderness
thick weeds/luxuriant growth/Illicium anisatum, a shrub with poisonous leaves/impertinent

sentences.english: You will crawl on your belly through the brushwood, and you will eat grass like the beasts of the forest.
sentences.chinese: 你将在草莽中爬着走，你将象树林中的野人一样吃草。

sentences.english: To the network " stockaded village advocate " for, impersonal person ready wilderness.
sentences.chinese: 对网络“寨主”来说，并非人人都甘于草莽。

sentences.english: The heroic images of Robin hood-like figures still have great influence on modern literary world.
sentences.chinese: 草莽型英雄形象在当代文坛仍有巨大的影响。

sentences.english: He created a heroic image of Robin hood-like figure in his novel.
sentences.chinese: 他的小说塑造了一个罗宾汉似的草莽英雄形象。

definition: place in Hubei, the starting point for a major rebellion at the end of Western Han/also pr. [Lu:4 lin2]
true hero of Greenwood (refers to popular hero in Robin Hood style)
person who seeks advancement by any means/career climber/unscrupulous careerist
